thickness.low: subtle surface texture with minimal grain presence.
thickness.mid: a moderate amount of natural grain that adds gentle visual interest.
thickness.high: pronounced and expressive grain patterns that stand out.

coarseness.low: smooth, polished surfaces with a refined finish.
coarseness.mid: a balance of smoothness with slight natural roughness.
coarseness.high: raw, tactile surfaces with visible natural texture.

wiggleness.low: uniform, controlled material appearance with minimal natural variation.
wiggleness.mid: a gentle amount of natural irregularity blended into the material.
wiggleness.high: strong natural organic variation and irregularity.

bumpiness.low: minimal décor and clean, unobstructed surfaces.
bumpiness.mid: a curated amount of décor and accessories.
bumpiness.high: rich decorative layering with noticeable visual activity.

rigidity.low: a casual, loosely organized spatial arrangement.
rigidity.mid: a softly ordered arrangement with balanced placement.
rigidity.high: a highly structured and disciplined layout.

symmetry.low: asymmetrical composition with natural visual balance.

tone.low: a warm palette with earthy beiges, sands, and soft warm neutrals.
tone.mid: a balanced palette without strong warm or cool bias.
tone.high: a cool palette with crisp whites, soft grays, and subtle blue undertones.

saturation.high: richer yet still harmonious color intensity.

brightness.low: low-brightness, soft and shadowed color values.
brightness.mid: balanced mid-level brightness creating a calm atmosphere.

uniform.mid: soft tonal layering with gentle, harmonious variation.
uniform.high: more diverse hues with natural blended transitions.

bumpiness.high: intentional minimal layering: a few sculptural pieces only, with abundant negative space.

uniform.high: controlled palette variation within near-monochrome neutrals, keeping a gallery-like restraint.

tone.high: cool, airy neutrals with pale stone and blue-gray undertones, balanced by light wood warmth.
cool mineral neutrals with restrained contrast, inspired by stone, ash, and muted clay.

bumpiness.high: layered but restrained décor, emphasizing handmade objects and negative space.

tone.low: warm creamy neutrals with oatmeal, sand, and soft taupe undertones.

uniform.high: subtle tonal layering across warm neutrals, keeping the palette cohesive and calm.
harmonious color variety with a few bold accents, keeping the palette intentional and graphic.

tone.low: warm mid-century palette with walnut tones, caramel leather, and creamy off-whites.

tone.mid: balanced warm neutrals with creamy whites, soft greiges, and gentle wood warmth.

coarseness.high: tactile farmhouse texture: visible wood grain, lightly distressed finishes, and natural stone character.

tone.high: cool industrial neutrals: concrete gray, charcoal, and steel tones with sharp contrast.

coarseness.mid: a mix of refined and raw: concrete, metal, and aged wood balanced with smoother surfaces.

tone.low: warm cabin palette: honey wood, tobacco leather, deep taupe, and earthy browns.

brightness.high: brightened rustic atmosphere with warm highlights and sunlit wood, without losing coziness.

bumpiness.high: rich, curated layering: textiles, art, books, and plants arranged with a collected, lived-in feel.

uniform.high: diverse hues and patterns intentionally mixed, with a cohesive warm undertone tying it together.

symmetry.high: strong symmetrical alignment with intentional focal points and balanced geometric repetition.

tone.high: cool high-contrast palette: crisp black-and-white, deep charcoal, and metallic highlights.

bumpiness.mid: curated luxury layering: bold art, sculptural décor, and reflective accents without clutter.

thickness.increase: bolder material presence with more visible texture character
thickness.decrease: more subtle surface expression with minimized grain presence

coarseness.increase: more raw and tactile finishes with less polished refinement
coarseness.decrease: smoother, more polished surfaces with a refined finish

wiggleness.increase: more organic, natural material character with softer irregularity
wiggleness.decrease: cleaner, more synthetic precision with controlled material regularity

rigidity.increase: a more structured, orderly layout with clearer alignment and organization
rigidity.decrease: a looser, more relaxed layout with less strict alignment

symmetry.increase: stronger visual balance with more symmetrical placement cues
symmetry.decrease: a more asymmetrical composition with natural, informal balance

bumpiness.increase: increased decorative articulation and layered detail
bumpiness.decrease: a calmer, more minimal decorative approach with reduced visual clutter

tone.increase: a subtle shift toward cooler hues while staying cohesive
tone.decrease: a subtle shift toward warmer hues while staying cohesive

saturation.increase: slightly richer color intensity while remaining harmonious
saturation.decrease: more muted, restrained color intensity with softer chroma

brightness.increase: a brighter overall atmosphere with more luminous lighting
brightness.decrease: a deeper, more subdued atmosphere with softer, lower brightness

uniformity.increase: more tonal variety and layered palette diversity
uniformity.decrease: a more uniform, controlled palette with reduced variation

assembly.prefix: Please refine the existing living room image with the following targeted changes:
assembly.preserve: Keep the same room viewpoint, camera framing, and overall composition. Preserve all aspects not mentioned below.
assembly.suffix: Make the refinement look like a natural design revision of the same space, not a different room.
